name: telebot-panel-pro
description: Advanced Telegram Bot Control Panel with User Bot Management, Secure Terminal, and Real-time Monitoring

scripts.build: echo 'Building TeleBot Panel Pro...' && cp -r netlify/functions/package.json netlify/functions/node_modules/ ../ || true
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && node -e "console.log('âœ“ All systems ready')"
scripts.generate:hash: node -e "const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs'); const hash = bcrypt.hashSync(process.argv[2] || 'TeleBotPro@2024!', 10); console.log('Password hash:', hash)"
scripts.generate:env: cp .env.example .env && echo '.env file created. Please edit with your values.'

author: TeleBot Pro Team
